name: Start | Stop
description: Assign or un-assign yourself from an issue/task.

start.description: Assign yourself and/or others to the issue/task.

teammates.description: Users other than yourself to assign to the issue

reviewDelayTolerance.description: When considering a user for a task: if they have existing PRs with no reviews, how long should we wait before 'increasing' their assignable task limit?

taskStaleTimeoutDuration.description: When displaying the '/start' response, how long should we wait before considering a task 'stale' and provide a warning?

startRequiresWallet.description: If true, users must set their wallet address with the /wallet command before they can start tasks.

maxConcurrentTasks.description: The maximum number of tasks a user can have assigned to them at once, based on their role.

assignedIssueScope.description: When considering a user for a task: should we consider their assigned issues at the org, repo, or network level?

emptyWalletText.default: Please set your wallet address with the /wallet command first and try again.
emptyWalletText.description: a message to display when a user tries to start a task without setting their wallet address.

rolesWithReviewAuthority.description: When considering a user for a task: which roles should be considered as having review authority? All others are ignored.

requiredLabelsToStart.description: If set, a task must have at least one of these labels to be started.
